casebody.data:
Officer Vance PLUMHOFF, et al., petitioners,
v.
Whitne RICKARD, a Minor Child, Individually, and as Surviving Daughter of Donald Rickard, Deceased, By and Through Her Mother Samantha Rickard, as Parent and Next Fiend. No. 12-1117. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 21, 2014.

Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
